alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Egypt Lake-Leto, or near Tampa, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lutz, Keystone, Greater Northdale, Tampa International Airport, East Lake, East Lake-Orient Park, Gandy, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, University, Palm Harbor, Palm River-Clair Mel, Feather Sound, Safety Harbor, West Park and Oldsmar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
